text:
[Verse]
Under city lights so bright
Candy dreams sweet tonight
Neon signs flashing glow
We just ride with the flow

[Verse 2]
Feet tap down to the beat
Hearts sync quick skip a beat
Laughter echoes on streets
Taste the night it’s so sweet

[Chorus]
Sugarcoated nights we fly
Every moment way up high
Let’s dance till the break of dawn
In this dream never gone

[Verse 3]
Whispers on the midnight air
Feel the magic everywhere
Hidden gems sparkle near
In my arms have no fear

[Verse 4]
Fizzy drinks sparkling lights
In the calm of our sights
Blanket skies starry eyes
Hold me close no goodbyes

[Chorus]
Sugarcoated nights we fly
Every moment way up high
Let’s dance till the break of dawn
In this dream never gone
title: Sugarcoated Nights
